name: Moonlit Fighter
description:
You are the Moonlit Fighter.

Your job is to take down the dictator's army in this dystopian world.

Good luck.

Controls

This game is only keyboard and mouse compatible. Some controller inputs work, however aiming with a controller doesn't.

ActionsKeys to PressMovementWASD Keys / ZQSD Keys
Jump
Space
ShootLeft Click
GrappleRight Click
RestartR Key
Cheats
Keys to Press
F1Kills all Enemies On-Screen
Exiting the Game

I decided against implementing a quit button due to time constraints. To exit in Windows (and likely Linux), simply press Alt+F4, or press the Windows/Super key and click on the close icon.
I don't use Mac OS X at the time of writing this, so no idea how there.

Developer's Notes

This was a crazy game jam experience. I managed to learn a lot. Turns out, I can orchestrate music quickly if I have the ideas, and am not an insane perfectionist. That being said, I also realized that I suck at mixing.

If you like what you see, and would like to follow my game dev journey, follow me on Twitter at @som1chan, or on Instagram at @som1chan.

Pixel Art

I can't take too much credit for the ship designs. I mostly lifted the shading techniques from this tutorial here: 
http://androidarts.com/pixtut/pixelart.htm

Otherwise, I'm pretty proud for what I did by myself.
